org.fhnw.aigs.server.gameHandling

Class ServerConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.server.gameHandling.ServerConfiguration

  • public class ServerConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Due to the fact that the class uses the Singleton Pattern, it is not possible to instantiate ClientCommunication directly. In order to get to an instance, use getInstance() instead.
    v1.0 Initial release
    v1.1 Functional changes
    v1.2 Features added and default values changed v1.2.1 Minor Changes in presets
    Version:
    1.2.1 (Raphael Stoeckli, 12.11.2014)
    Author:
    Matthias St√∂ckli (v1.0)

    • Field Detail

      • tempLogsDirectory

        private java.lang.String tempLogsDirectory
        The temporary logs directory after changing the actual directory.
        The location can only be changed with a restart of the server.
        For handling purpose the old value has to be preserved in this parameter until restart. Will not be marshalled
        Since:
        v1.2

      • portNumber

        private int portNumber
        The port the server will connect to.
        Default: 25123

      • isConsoleMode

        private boolean isConsoleMode
        Indicates whether the ConsoleMode is activated. Please note: At the moment the console mode is only functional.
        Default: false

      • isCompactLoggingEnabled

        private boolean isCompactLoggingEnabled
        Indicates whether the console logging should be printed on one line. Default: true

      • keepAliveTimeOut

        private int keepAliveTimeOut
        The interval between KeepAliveMessages.
        Default: 10000

      • useKeepAliveManager

        private boolean useKeepAliveManager
        Indicates whether the KeepAliveManager is active or not.
        Default: false

      • isXMLlogging

        private boolean isXMLlogging
        Indicates whether the file logging should be in the verbose XML format.
        Default: false

      • hidesOnClose

        private boolean hidesOnClose
        Indicates whether the server will minimize to a tray icon if the close button is pressed.
        Default: false

      • isMultiLoginAllowed

        private boolean isMultiLoginAllowed
        Indicates whether one user can log in several times. In production mode it is not recommended to set this to true.
        Default: false

      • whatIsMyIpUrl

        private java.lang.String whatIsMyIpUrl
        URL to a service which returns the server's external IP address (referer) as plain text.
        If the service is implemented autonomically, the php script is as follows: <?php echo $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']; ?> Default:

      • logDirectory

        private java.lang.String logDirectory
        Location where logfiles are stored Default: ./logs
        Since:
        v1.1

      • gamelibsDirectory

        private java.lang.String gamelibsDirectory
        Location where the game libaries (JAR) are stored Default: ./gamelibs
        Since:
        v1.1

      • gameSourcesDirectory

        private java.lang.String gameSourcesDirectory
        Location where the game sources are stored. This location is only used if games are recompiled during runtime Default: ./games
        Since:
        v1.1

      • isAnonymousLoginAllowed

        private boolean isAnonymousLoginAllowed
        Indicates whether the credentials of the clients will be checked from the server.
        If true, no username or identification code will be checked. An anonymous user will be created ad-hoc at runtime and discarded after the game termination or stop of the server
        Since:
        v1.2

      • instance

        private static ServerConfiguration instance
        The sole instance of the ServerConfiguration

      • initialize

        static void initialize()
        Creates the Singleton instance

      • readConfiguration

        private void readConfiguration()
        This method reads the server configuration. By default it will load the file 'conf/ServerConfig.xml'. This file is directly dependent on the "ServerConfiguration" class. If the file does not exist, a new file will be created and hard coded default values will be used.

      • createNewConfiguration

        private static void createNewConfiguration()
        Creates a new ServerConfig.xml and writes it to the file system

      • saveConfiguration

        private static void saveConfiguration(ServerConfiguration config,
                                      java.lang.String folder,
                                      java.lang.String file)
        Saves the defined configuration
        Parameters:
        config - Configuration to save
        folder - Folder where configuration is located. Do not add a trailing slash (/ or \)
        file - File to save the configuration in
        Since:
        v1.2

      • saveInstance

        public static void saveInstance()
        Saves the current singleton instance of the server configuration
        Since:
        v1.2

      • printConfiguration

        public void printConfiguration()
        Logs the current ServerConfiguration.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        This main method allows for the direct creation of a new configuration file It will simply invoke "createNewConfiguration". parameters can be changed
